modmenu.descriptionTranslation.music_del: This mod lets Minecraft music play more often.
options.music_delay_reducer.debugModeTog: Enables or disables debug mode for additional output to the console. (Useful for finding or reporting bugs)
options.music_delay_reducer.delayTime.to: The waiting time (in minutes) that passes until a new track is played.
options.music_delay_reducer.title: Music Delay Reducer Options
